name: Hop-hop to the top!
description:
•It's a small platformer, you purpose - reach a top🔝

•Break chests to get a flag🧰

•Place flag to set checkpoint🔺

•Level is generates in random way🔀

•Level creating may lasts one minute on some devices⏱️

Controls:

R - back to last flag

E - place flag

Space - JUMP!

Esc - save and back to main menu

It's my first gamedev, illustrating and game music making experience, but I really tried hard😵 . 

I'll be very grateful for your feedback, bug report and support!💕

P.S. screenshots from my old tablet, in-game picture looks much better
